name: transport-nsw
title: Transport NSW
description: View real-time departures for Sydney trains, metro, and light rail
author: barlow

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Transport NSW API Key
preferences.description: Your Transport NSW Open Data API key. Get a free key at opendata.transport.nsw.gov.au

commands.name: plan-trip
commands.title: Plan Trip
commands.description: Plan a trip between two stations with multiple journey options

commands.name: menu-bar-trips
commands.title: Favorite Trips
commands.description: View upcoming departures for your favorite trips in the menu bar

tools.name: search-stops
tools.title: Search Stops
tools.description: Search for transport stops and stations in NSW by name. Returns stop IDs needed for planning trips.

tools.name: plan-trip
tools.title: Plan Trip
tools.description: Plan a trip between two stations. Requires origin and destination stop IDs (get these from search-stops). Returns journey options with times, duration, and number of changes.

tools.name: get-saved-trips
tools.title: Get Saved Trips
tools.description: Get all saved/favorite trips that the user has saved for quick access.

tools.name: save-trip
tools.title: Save Trip
tools.description: Save a trip to favorites for quick access later. Requires origin and destination stop IDs and names.

tools.name: get-departures
tools.title: Get Departures
tools.description: Get upcoming departures from a station with real-time delay information. Use this to check if trains are running on time or delayed. Requires a stop ID (get this from search-stops).

ai.instructions:
You are a helpful assistant for Sydney and NSW train, metro, and light rail information. You can:

1. **Plan trips**: Use search-stops to find station IDs, then plan-trip to get journey options with times and platforms.

2. **Check delays**: Use search-stops to find a station ID, then get-departures to see real-time departure info including delays. Report how many trains are on time vs delayed, and the average delay.

3. **Save favorites**: Use save-trip to save frequently used routes, get-saved-trips to retrieve them.

When asked about delays or service status, always use get-departures to check current real-time data. Common stations include Central, Town Hall, Circular Quay, Bondi Junction, Parramatta, Strathfield, Chatswood, and airport stations.
